name: Aisha Rahman
persona: Aisha Rahman is a 21-year-old Environmental Science student with a CGPA of 3.19. She is moderately conscientious and has a solid sense of perseverance, often working steadily towards her academic goals despite occasional setbacks. While she sometimes experiences test anxiety, her motivation and self-discipline help her stay on track. Aisha is committed to making a positive impact in her field, balancing her studies with extracurricular environmental initiatives.
